XalanDOMString::size_type length,
bool preserveSpace,
bool disableOutputEscaping )
 

Construct an instance.

Parameters:
constructionContext   context for construction of object
stylesheetTree   stylesheet containing element
lineNumber   line number in document
columnNumber   column number in document
ch   pointer to character string for element
start   starting offset of element
length   number of characters in element
preserveSpace   true is space should be preserved
disableOutputEscaping   true if output escaping should be disabled

Returns:
A pointer to the new instance.
